div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Feb. 3, 1896. ANOTHER SUPPORTER OF THE POLISH CATHOLIC CONGRESS

body.p: (We have received the following correspondence with a request that it be published in the Dziennik Chicagoski.)

We respectfully wish to announce that the St. Hedwig Society of the St. Joseph Parish in Town of Lake decided at its last meeting, held January 26, to support the Polish Catholic Congress with all its strength, and to take an active part in it.
